org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.simulation.unit

Class GenericUnitSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.simulation.unit.AbstractUnitSimulator
      • org.openbase.bco.dal.lib.simulation.unit.GenericUnitSimulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openbase.jul.iface.Activatable

    public class GenericUnitSimulator
extends AbstractUnitSimulator
    Author:
    Divine Threepwood This class implements and generic unit simulator by extending the AbstractUnitSimulator and simulating each service of the unit by custom or generic service simulators.
